queries.query:
from(bucket: "controller")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "joystick")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "x")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "controller")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "joystick")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "x")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "controller")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "joystick")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "x")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 24h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "controller")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "joystick")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "y")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "controller")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "joystick")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "y")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "controller")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "joystick")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "y")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 24h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "controller")
  |> range(start: -10m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "buttons")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "A" or r._field == "B" or r._field == "X" or r._field == "Y")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> last()
  |> pivot(
      rowKey:["_time"],
      columnKey: ["_field"],
      valueColumn: "_value"
  )

from(bucket: "controller")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "buttons")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "A" or r._field == "B" or r._field == "X" or r._field == "Y")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> mean()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with row: "avg" }))   // <-- altijd beschikbaar, perfect als rowKey
  |> pivot(
      rowKey: ["row"],
      columnKey: ["_field"],
      valueColumn: "_value"
  )

from(bucket: "controller")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "buttons")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "A" or r._field == "B" or r._field == "X" or r._field == "Y")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> mean()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with row: "avg" }))   // <-- altijd beschikbaar, perfect als rowKey
  |> pivot(
      rowKey: ["row"],
      columnKey: ["_field"],
      valueColumn: "_value"
  )
